description.full: Try the full demo version of PES 2012 and experience unrivalled football gameplay. See how Active AI anticipates play, moving players into space and offering limitless attacking options. Try the new Off the Ball Control, which makes you the target in dead ball situations. Finally, experience the freedom of Teammate Control, which gives you the power to directly control a second player. Experience the most complete PES to date.
description.short: Be one of the first to experience the awesome PES 2012, with this complete demo version. Try new Teammate Control, Active AI system, and Off the Ball Control.
